column4: wtf... i have compiz running on a dual x screen setup (nvidia binary) after many-a-headache but i lost my panel on my main screen. Also desktop cube breaks compiz
I'm not aware of a "mouse service"
the mouse is just part of the xorg display
how do i reload a mouse cursor theme?
then don't quote it if a.) you don't believe it b.) don't know if it's true
not if it's nonsense and you don't believe it yourself
giving wrong/miss-leading information is just as unhelpful as not giving a warning for something
there maybe a .tmp version of the file
in addition to the existing version
certainly not in the way I think you mean
i want to reload mouse driver/services
my pointer icon is glitching out. logging out/in resets it so it doesn't glitch (until it starts glitching again)
the xorg application is what controls your mouse, so you can't restart the "mouse" component as it's part of X, you need to restart X (logging in/out)
